Instructions.Ollama: Install Ollama from https://ollama.com, then run: ollama pull llama3.2
Instructions.OpenRouter: Get free API key from https://openrouter.ai/keys. Free model: meta-llama/llama-3.2-3b-instruct:free
Instructions.Groq: Get free API key from https://console.groq.com. Free models: llama-3.1-8b-instant, mixtral-8x7b-32768
